title: Culinary Compass
summary: You know that feeling, when you want to go out to eat somewhere different, somewhere special, but you can't decide where?! With so much information these days, it can be hard to make a simple choice, so we end up going back to the same restaurants time and time again. Culinary Compass allows you to search high-end restaurants, filtering either by those nearby or in a certain country, by their awards, and even gives you the chance to be told where to go for when you are feeling spontaneous!

title: PupVenture
summary: Stuck for places to take your pup for a well-deserved run-around? PupVenture provides you with a list of dog-friendly destinations near your chosen locations. You can input a date and location and you will be given nearby destinations and the weather forecast for that date. If you like one of the destinations you visit, you can then save it as a favourite!

title: README Generator
summary: Are you a developer, tired of writing READMEs out for each project? This command-line application generates a professional README file based on your input, saving time and ensuring formatting standards are followed consistently.

title: Weather Dashboard
summary: Thinking of taking a trip but worried about the weather? This weather dashboard allows you to check the 5-day weather forecast for a number of locations, taking its data from Open Weather Map (https://openweathermap.org/).  Local storage is used for favourites to persist when the page is reloaded, so you can easily check the same locations at a later date!
